sentences.en: As an importantorientation tool, adjustable stabilizer is especially suitablefor modern drilling.
sentences.cn: 可变径稳定器作为一类重要的定向工具, 尤其应用于现代钻井过程中.

sentences.en: Choice of stabilizer in emulsion systems has always been rather empirical.
sentences.cn: 在乳液体系中,稳定剂的选择往往凭经验.

sentences.en: Dextrose is a stabilizer, accounting for 5 - 30ú ? in weight ratio in granula.
sentences.cn: 以葡萄糖为稳定剂, 其在粒剂中所占的重量百分比在5-30%之间.

sentences.en: Fats without a stabilizer should be used with extreme caution.
sentences.cn: 需谨慎使用未加稳定剂的脂肪.

sentences.en: Fin stabilizer is one of the most effective ship - stabilized equipment.
sentences.cn: 减摇鳍是一种应用最广泛的主动式减摇装置.

sentences.en: Hydrotalcite - rare earth - Zinc complex heating stabilizer was prepared, its'stability was compared.
sentences.cn: 研究了水滑石 - 稀土 - 锌复合热稳定剂的制备, 并比较了其热稳定效果.

sentences.en: In this paper a laser stabilizer using double feedback signals is proposed.
sentences.cn: 提出了一种采用双反馈方式工作的激光光强稳定系统.

sentences.en: It is the good stabilizer of photosensitive resin, sensitive emulsion, synthetic resin.
sentences.cn: 是光敏树脂 、 感光乳剂 、 合成树脂的良好稳定剂.

sentences.en: Rotor following a stabilizer bar, with the blade perpendicular.
sentences.cn: 旋翼下面有稳定杆, 与桨叶呈直角.

sentences.en: Stabilizer is an important component in BHA of hole deviation control.
sentences.cn: 稳定器是井斜控制井底钻具组合中的重要组件.

sentences.en: The automatic stabilizer part of the deficit will shrink naturally.
sentences.cn: 赤字的自动稳定部分会自然地减少.

sentences.en: The compound stabilizer contained monostearin 0.2 % and MCC 0.2 %.
sentences.cn: 复配稳定剂的配方为:单甘酯0.2%、MCC微晶纤维素0.2%.

sentences.en: The fouling rate decreases after improving dispersion efficiency of stabilizer.
sentences.cn: 通过提高水稳药剂的阻垢分散性能来降低水冷器的结垢速率.

sentences.en: The key step of he process was adding foam - stabilizer.
sentences.cn: 加入稳泡剂是工艺的关键.

sentences.en: The stability of effective chlorine of sodium hypochlorite was improved with stabilizer.
sentences.cn: 加入稳定剂后,提高了次氯酸钠中有效氯的稳定性.

words.tran_cn: 使…坚固；使…安定；装稳定器（等于stablize）
[机][电][助剂]稳定剂；稳定器；安定装置

phrases.tran_cn: 减摇鳍装置；防摇鳍，鳍板稳定器

trans.tran_cn: 安定装置，安定翼，有安定作用之人（或物），稳定者
trans.tran_en: a chemical that helps something such as a food to stay in the same state, for example to prevent it from separating into different liquids
